column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////-Not making a huge deal about it being the Chicago thing -- deep dish pizza. Oh my god
column3: get out your camera and I'll take your picture with the pizza! They'll be so jealous back in Moline
column5: sorry about that... the point is
column6: Malnati's doesn't assume deep dish pizza eaters are rubes from corn country. They just make pizza.
